Я бы хотел сказать, что КСка очень интересная игра. В ней сочетаются многие параметры, когда играешь с СНГ комьюнити находишь новых знакомых и т.д.
En gerçekçi ve rekabet ortamı, oynanışı en iyi olan FPS oyunu.

[h1] Counter-Strike: Global Offensive [/h1]
Sadly CS is full of cheaters nowadays and competitive is practically unplayable, ranks say nothing about your skill now also, considering you are lucky that nobody is cheating in your match. 

The developers are not listening to the community and game care is horrible, they do not care what we want, they want just another cash grab from new case and skins.

Base game modes that CS offers are full of cheaters. If you want to play fair matches for free your only choice is playing third-party site like Faceit. Otherwise you might consider paying subscription on ESEA or other. 

I own this game since 2012 when it came out, and I think the game is getting worse and worse. Despite this CS:GO is still the best skill-based legendary FPS game with 5v5 bomb plant objective that exists imo. 

But after all, you still want to play another match :)
Gra mimo swoich lat jest w dalszym ciągu na wysokim poziomie. Duża ilość graczy zapewnia świetną zabawę online :-)
The amount of swear words I used while playing this absolute-superior game is terryifying.

This one time i was walking down the beach and i saw some homeless dude beating his shmeat, and i was like "Damn, i could really go for a sandwich right about now". So i went home and made one, only to realise the sandwich was trying to seduce me, so i bought a new phone case
